body: Nearby Attractions       After visiting Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site, we recommend visiting Canyon de Chelly National Monument, Navajo National Monument and Petrified Forest National Park.         Canyon de Chelly National Monument www.nps.gov/cach     Navajo National Monument www.nps.gov/nava     Petrified Forest National Park www.nps.gov/pefo
title: Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site: Nearby Attractions
